info.name: Spiceworks Full Width Fix (Remove Ads)
info.description: Since you already run Adblock to remove ads from Spiceworks, this stylesheet change will widen the tickets area so you do not have 320px of blank space.
info.additionalInfo:
Updates:
2015-Mar-09: add #sidebar blocking for new v2 Ticket List view.

FAQ:
Q: Why do you need access to EVERY site?
A: Because I don't know what YOUR site is for your local Spiceworks installation.  You must edit the stylesheet and add a domain.

Contact Information:
www.ozmonet.com

data.title: Added Code to Hide Top Ad
(update) Works with "Stylus" -- "Stylish" is broken and has spyware embedded
